DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics safety Singulair ( 10 mg ) Xyzal ( 5 mg ) free combination fixed-dose combination HCP1102
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Safety Singulair Xyzal Free Combination Fixed-dose Combination
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age 20 55 Signed inform consent Has history hypersensitivity IP ingredient Hypotension hypertension Has history acute infection within 14 day screen
